import React from'react';import{USD_SYMBOL,KHR_SYMBOL,formatUSD,formatKHR}from'../utils/formatters';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderItemEntry(_ref){let{item,onUpdateQuantity}=_ref;const itemTotalUSD=item.priceUSD*item.quantity;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-item-entry",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-item-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"order-item-name",children:item.khmerName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"order-item-price-single",children:[USD_SYMBOL,formatUSD(item.priceUSD)," / ",KHR_SYMBOL,formatKHR(item.priceKHR)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"order-item-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onUpdateQuantity(item.khmerName,-1),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"order-item-qty",children:item.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onUpdateQuantity(item.khmerName,1),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"order-item-total-price",children:[USD_SYMBOL,formatUSD(itemTotalUSD)]})]});}export default OrderItemEntry;
